articles.description: Indian Institute of Science (IISc) researchers have developed a framework that will allow creation of next-generation analogue computer chipsets. These chips would be faster and less energy-consuming compared to the digital ones found in electronics today.   …
articles.content: Indian Institute of Science (IISc) researchers have developed a framework that will allow creation of next-generation analogue computer chipsets. These chips would be faster and less energy-consuming… [+2400 chars]

articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.title: Fastest Star Known To Mankind Found Orbiting Milky Way's Black Hole At 8,000 Km/s
articles.description: A star with the shortest orbital period around a black hole has been discovered by scientists. This star orbits a black hole at speeds of 8,000 kilometres per second. The discovery was made by researchers at the University of Cologne and Masaryk University in…
articles.content:
